mng: to draw (e.g. a bow), to pull, to stretch sth, to extend, to lengthen, to involve or implicate in, to attract, to lead, to guide, to leave, to provide evidence or justification for, old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters

exm.mng: to quote, to cite, to recommend, to appoint
to give rise to, to lead to, to cause, to arouse
to lead to, to trigger, to initiate, to cause, to evoke (emotions)
to guide, to show, to point (the way), directions, guidance, guidelines
to guide, to lead (around), to conduct, to boot, introduction, primer
